name: WRECK
description:
Take control of a small physics based car in a large world of obsticles. Control your cars speed and rotation while you try to stay alive. Complete three "Zones" each with difficult levels and new puzzles and try to complete the END zone to beat the game.

Features
  • Challenging, long levels
  • 3 Zones of gameplay
  • END zone with 8 differnent "puzzles"
  • Suprise at the end
Planned Features
  • Infinite mode
  • Shop with powerups

Wreck is the first game by Professor Platypus so please, enjoy. More games will come but we need funds to build them! Please consider paying at least one dollar to this project so we can continue making games and releasing them for cheap or for free!
